meanings.def: connected with drawings and design, especially in the production of books, magazines, websites, etc.
very clear and full of details, especially about something unpleasant
examples: a graphic account/description of a battle
He kept telling us about his operation, in the most graphic detail.
This is a very graphic account of life in Victorian England.

meanings.def: a diagram or picture, especially one that appears on a computer screen or in a newspaper or book
